parse.title: The War of Wrath, Op. 71 (Vocal Score)

wikitext.*:
[[File:WOW Vocal Score Cover.png|thumb|Artwork from the Vocal Score by permission of Ted Nasmith.]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2023, the complete Vocal Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[The War of Wrath, Op. 71 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 138 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete piano reduction of the score with introduction by the composer, synopsis and translations of the Elvish.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2019 “Beren: Song of Parting”
[[Category:Music books]]
